channel.title: I need to make these portals at these Coords to these places.. Coders help meplz
channel.description:
I would like to get these portals at these locations...
I would like a portal at 3210,3433 And I want it to bring me to the KQ lair. I would like a portal at 3209,3433 And I want it to bring me to the KBD lair. I would also like a portal at 3209,3434 and have it bring me to the Castle Wars....
If someone can tell me at least how to make these codes.. I would appreciate it. If you would do that. If you can make the codes for me, for them things. I would appreciate that even more!!
Please help me.. I want these badly!

item.title: I need to make these portals at these Coords to these places.. Coders help meplz
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Or you can just search “zamarok,guthix,saradomin” those portals and change them then go to the makeGlobalObjects and type the X,Y positions where you want the portal to spawn.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to make these portals at these Coords to these places.. Coders help meplz

item.title: I need to make these portals at these Coords to these places.. Coders help meplz
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

case portalID: teleportToX = coordX; teleportToY = CoordY; sendMessage("Messagehere");

Read full topic

item.title: I need to make these portals at these Coords to these places.. Coders help meplz
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

How about you give me the cords you want it to tele you to, you give us the cords you want the portal to be at and then i’ll do it for you.
